statusLine.command: input=$(cat); current_dir="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir' | sed "s|$HOME|~|")"; model_name="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; user="$(whoami)"; hostname="$(hostname -s)"; git_info=""; if cd "$current_dir" 2>/dev/null; then branch="$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null)"; if [[ -n "$branch" ]]; then if git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- 2>/dev/null; then git_info=" • git:$branch"; else git_info=" • git:$branch*"; fi; fi; fi; printf '\033[90m▸\033[0m \033[36m%s@%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[0m\033[33m%s\033[0m \033[90m[\033[35m%s\033[90m]\033[0m' "$user" "$hostname" "$current_dir" "$git_info" "$model_name"
